data.description:
Defend against relentless meteorites or face destruction! Meteoric VR offers a nostalgic, low-poly, first-person space shooter experience, where your mission is to shield our planet from incoming meteors. Be mindful of your lives! Our standout feature involves unique hand movements for precise shooting.

Key Features:
• Fully implemented hand tracking
• Missions with unique enemies
• Endless level 
• Mixed reality mode
• Challenges 
• Engage in 180-degree gameplay
• Enjoy motion sickness-free action
• Simple to pick up and play
• Aim assist support
• Discover various power-ups
• Incorporate fitness into your gameplay
• Experience adaptive music
• Compatible with LIV and MRC setups

Join our Discord community to stay updated, gain exclusive insights, access behind-the-scenes content, and connect with fellow beta testers. If you're interested in the game or eager to provide constructive feedback, come be a part of the Meteoric VR Galaxy → https://discord.gg/VjgDjR5rkD

changelog.change_log: Redesigned tutorial and missions with more power-ups in 3 difficulties - easy, medium, and hard. You can play two missions for free and unlock the full game through in-app purchase to support game development.
Resolved issue where hands were not visible during the initial launch when spatial or audio permissions were not allowed.

New power-up crystals and UFO in Mixed Reality


Updated UFO explosions


Added flames on flying meteors
Fixed loading in mixed reality on Quest 3

Added one hand challenge level
Glowing hands animation
Improved the loading process
New sound effects
Fixed the mobile multiplayer avatar
Fixed bug in challenges with the instant game over
Fixed saving gold crystals caught in the endless

Updated hand tracking to version 2.1 for improved precision and accuracy in hand movements

Each ability in the game can now be upgraded, offering new and exciting ways to play

Added challenges to the game, providing new ways to test your skills

Visualized player's hit, making it easier to see the impact of meteors

New wormhole and meteor trails effects have been added, making the game even more visually stunning

Numerous bug fixes have been implemented to improve stability and performance
Added new missions and endless mode
